column4: HI. Can someone recommend a decent file backup utility that can copy directories which only replaces the files which have been altered and leaves the unaltered ones? I had one in windoze but not now
thanks, i will look that up too
konserve looks good. If I can get it write over files which have been altered while ignoring the rest I will have won. I really like that it is automatic, even windoze didn't have that.
